text:
You need to include the `context` parameter in your form api submission - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/marketing/forms/v3-legacy#submit-data-to-a-form-supporting-authentication>

Specifically, the value of `hutk` will be the value of the cookie called `HubSpotutk` that is set by the HubSpot Tracking code

Here's a tutorial I wrote: <https://gist.github.com/robertainslie/b110b8275beee1b27255c4d6e2ba2e8c>
